scripts.buildResources: rm -rf './dist' && mkdir dist && cp -r './build/.' './dist/chrome' && cp -r './manifest/chrome/.' './dist/chrome' && cp -r './res/.' './dist/chrome' && cp -r './build/.' './dist/ff' && cp -r './manifest/firefox/.' './dist/ff' && cp -r './res/.' './dist/ff'
scripts.build: npm run buildParcel && npm run buildResources
scripts.watchChrome: npm run buildResources && parcel watch src/*.ts --no-hmr -d dist/chrome
scripts.watchFirefox: npm run buildResources && parcel watch src/*.ts --no-hmr -d dist/ff
